quote_last: on January 9th, 1955, a moribund world drew the first blood from its extraterrestrial assassins.
title: Don't Panic!
author: Geoff St. Reynard

quote_last:
.”

title: The Play That Won
author: Ralph Henry Barbour

quote_last: . No sunlight comes into the room now through the windows at right. Outside the day is fine but increasingly sultry, with a faint haziness in the air which softens the glare of the sun.
title: Long Day's Journey Into Night
author: Eugene O'Neill
